SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Interface GameRequest

All Known Implementing Classes:
Controller
public interface GameRequest
This interface represents all methods/actions that can be invoked from clients

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    chooseColor(String username, PlayerColor color)
    Assigns color to the player with username.
    void
    draw(String username, int idToDraw)
    Draws a card from the selected place.

    Places the card on the side and position specified.

    Places the secret objective from one of the two available.
    void

    Places the starter card of the player in the chosen side.
    void
    sendMessage(Message message)
    Sends message from the author.
    void
    setPlayersNumber(String username, int playersNumber)
    Sets the number of players required to start the game, and if the game has not yet started and the number of players has been reached, it starts the game and remove the excess players.

  • Method Details

    • placeStarter

      void placeStarter(String username, Side side) throws InvalidPlayerActionException, InvalidGamePhaseException
      Places the starter card of the player in the chosen side.
      Parameters:
      username - the player's username.
      side - the side of the starter card.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerActionException
      InvalidGamePhaseException

    • chooseColor

      void chooseColor(String username, PlayerColor color) throws NonexistentPlayerException, InvalidColorException, InvalidPlayerActionException, InvalidGamePhaseException, RemoteException
      Assigns color to the player with username.
      Parameters:
      username - of the player who have chosen the color.
      color - chosen by the player.
      Throws:
      NonexistentPlayerException
      InvalidColorException
      InvalidPlayerActionException
      InvalidGamePhaseException
      RemoteException

    • placeObjectiveCard

      void placeObjectiveCard(String username, int chosenObjective) throws InvalidPlayerActionException, InvalidGamePhaseException
      Places the secret objective from one of the two available.
      Parameters:
      username - of the player.
      chosenObjective - the chosen objective.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerActionException
      InvalidGamePhaseException

    • placeCard

      void placeCard(String username, int frontId, int backId, Side side, Position position) throws InvalidPlayerActionException, Playground.UnavailablePositionException, Playground.NotEnoughResourcesException, InvalidGamePhaseException, SuspendedGameException, InvalidCardIdException
      Places the card on the side and position specified.
      Parameters:
      username - of the player.
      frontId - of the card's front to place.
      backId - of the card's back to place.
      side - of the card.
      position - in the playground.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerActionException
      Playground.UnavailablePositionException
      Playground.NotEnoughResourcesException
      InvalidGamePhaseException
      SuspendedGameException
      InvalidCardIdException

    • draw

      void draw(String username, int idToDraw) throws InvalidPlayerActionException, EmptyDeckException, InvalidGamePhaseException, InvalidIdForDrawingException, InvalidFaceUpCardException
      Draws a card from the selected place.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player.
      idToDraw - the id representing the deck or any of the face up card positions.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerActionException
      EmptyDeckException
      InvalidGamePhaseException
      InvalidIdForDrawingException
      InvalidFaceUpCardException

    • sendMessage

      void sendMessage(Message message) throws InvalidMessageException
      Sends message from the author.
      Parameters:
      message - sent by the author.
      Throws:
      InvalidMessageException

    • setPlayersNumber

      void setPlayersNumber(String username, int playersNumber) throws InvalidPlayersNumberException
      Sets the number of players required to start the game, and if the game has not yet started and the number of players has been reached, it starts the game and remove the excess players.
      Parameters:
      username - of the first player.
      playersNumber - the number of players established by the first player.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayersNumberException
